name: Crazy Van
description:
Controls:
Up arrow - Accelerate
Down arrow - Brake / Reverse
Left / Right arrow - Steer

(Fastest) Tutorial:
1.  Stop at GREEN rings to start the mission.
2. Get the passagers at the RED rings.
3. Take them to the BLUE rings at the beach.
4. The count down timer doesn't do anything. You won't loose.
5. If anything goes wrong, hit "Alt + F4" and restart the game ;)

Tip: It's easier to drive fast (believe me).
